overview: No Surrender (2011) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA) that took place on September 11, 2011 at the Impact Wrestling Zone in Orlando, Florida.[2] It was the seventh annual No Surrender chronology. At the beginning of the event, there was a short memorial to 9/11 victims.
title: TNA No Surrender 2011
